security.name: Cloud Security Alliance (CSA) Cloud Controls Matrix

controls.title: Identity and Access Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Establish comprehensive identity and access management policies for RDS instances and related resources

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies, roles, and database users through AWS IAM and RDS parameter groups with least privilege access principles

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Implement data classification and lifecycle management for RDS databases

implementation.description: Configure automated backups, retention policies, and data classification tags through RDS backup settings and AWS tags

controls.title: Encryption and Key Management
controls.description: Implement encryption at rest and in transit for RDS instances

implementation.description: Enable RDS encryption using AWS KMS keys and enforce SSL/TLS connections through parameter groups

controls.title: Business Continuity Management and Operational Resilience
controls.description: Establish business continuity and disaster recovery procedures for RDS

implementation.description: Configure Multi-AZ deployments, read replicas, and automated backup strategies with cross-region replication

controls.title: Audit Logging / Intrusion Detection
controls.description: Enable comprehensive logging and monitoring for RDS instances

implementation.description: Enable RDS Performance Insights, CloudWatch monitoring, and database audit logs with integration to CloudTrail

controls.title: Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Implement vulnerability scanning and patch management for RDS instances

implementation.description: Enable automatic minor version upgrades and configure maintenance windows for RDS instances

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to RDS resources

implementation.description: Implement IAM policies with resource-based permissions and database user management with role-based access control

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information to and from RDS

implementation.description: Enforce SSL/TLS encryption for all database connections and configure security groups to restrict network access

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest in RDS

implementation.description: Enable RDS encryption at rest using AWS KMS customer managed keys with appropriate key rotation policies

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Identify the types of events to be logged by RDS and supporting infrastructure

implementation.description: Configure database audit logging, CloudWatch logs, and CloudTrail for comprehensive event capture

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Conduct backups of user-level and system-level information contained in RDS

implementation.description: Configure automated backups with appropriate retention periods and cross-region backup replication

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor RDS instances to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks

implementation.description: Enable CloudWatch monitoring, RDS Performance Insights, and integrate with AWS GuardDuty for threat detection

controls.title: Vulnerability Monitoring and Scanning
controls.description: Monitor and scan for vulnerabilities in RDS instances and supporting infrastructure

implementation.description: Enable AWS Security Hub findings and implement regular security assessments of RDS configurations

controls.title: RDS snapshots should be private
controls.description: RDS snapshots should not be public to prevent unauthorized access to sensitive data

implementation.description: Ensure RDS snapshot sharing is restricted and automated checks prevent public snapshots

controls.title: RDS DB instances should have encryption at rest enabled
controls.description: RDS DB instances should be encrypted at rest to protect sensitive data

implementation.description: Enable encryption at rest for all RDS instances using AWS KMS keys

controls.title: RDS cluster snapshots and database snapshots should be encrypted at rest
controls.description: RDS snapshots should be encrypted to protect backup data

implementation.description: Ensure all RDS snapshots inherit encryption from the source database or are explicitly encrypted

controls.title: RDS DB instances should be configured with multiple Availability Zones
controls.description: RDS instances should use Multi-AZ for high availability and disaster recovery

implementation.description: Configure Multi-AZ deployment for production RDS instances to ensure high availability

controls.title: Enhanced monitoring should be configured for RDS DB instances
controls.description: Enhanced monitoring provides real-time metrics for the operating system of RDS instances

implementation.description: Enable Enhanced Monitoring for RDS instances with appropriate granularity and retention

controls.title: RDS DB instances should have deletion protection enabled
controls.description: Deletion protection prevents accidental deletion of RDS instances

implementation.description: Enable deletion protection for production RDS instances to prevent accidental deletion

controls.title: IAM authentication should be configured for RDS instances
controls.description: IAM database authentication provides secure access without embedding credentials

implementation.description: Enable IAM database authentication where supported and configure appropriate IAM policies

controls.title: RDS automatic minor version upgrades should be enabled
controls.description: Automatic minor version upgrades ensure security patches are applied

implementation.description: Enable automatic minor version upgrades and configure appropriate maintenance windows

controls.title: RDS DB instances should prohibit public read access
controls.description: RDS instances should not be publicly accessible to prevent unauthorized access

implementation.description: Configure RDS instances with PubliclyAccessible set to false and place in private subnets

controls.title: RDS clusters should have deletion protection enabled
controls.description: RDS clusters should have deletion protection to prevent accidental deletion

implementation.description: Enable deletion protection for RDS clusters in production environments

controls.title: Database logging should be enabled
controls.description: RDS instances should have appropriate database logs enabled for security monitoring

implementation.description: Enable relevant database logs (error, general, slow query) and export to CloudWatch Logs

controls.title: IAM authentication should be configured for RDS instances
controls.description: RDS instances should use IAM authentication where possible

implementation.description: Enable IAM database authentication for supported engine types and configure IAM policies

controls.title: RDS instances should have automatic backups enabled
controls.description: RDS instances should have automated backups configured for data protection

implementation.description: Configure automated backups with appropriate backup retention periods and backup windows

cost.name: AWS RDS Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Right-size RDS instances based on utilization
controls.description: Monitor and adjust RDS instance sizes based on actual CPU, memory, and I/O utilization

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics and RDS Performance Insights to analyze utilization and resize instances appropriately

controls.title: Implement Reserved Instance purchasing strategy
controls.description: Purchase Reserved Instances for predictable workloads to achieve significant cost savings

implementation.description: Analyze usage patterns and purchase 1-year or 3-year Reserved Instances for stable workloads

controls.title: Optimize storage type and provisioned IOPS
controls.description: Select appropriate storage types and avoid over-provisioning IOPS

implementation.description: Use gp3 storage where appropriate and monitor IOPS utilization to avoid over-provisioning

controls.title: Implement automated start/stop scheduling for non-production environments
controls.description: Schedule RDS instances to stop during non-business hours for development and testing environments

implementation.description: Use AWS Lambda and EventBridge to automate start/stop schedules for non-production RDS instances

controls.title: Optimize backup retention and cross-region replication
controls.description: Set appropriate backup retention periods and minimize unnecessary cross-region backup copies

implementation.description: Configure backup retention based on compliance requirements and evaluate cross-region backup necessity

controls.title: Monitor and optimize data transfer costs
controls.description: Minimize data transfer costs by optimizing read replica placement and application architecture

implementation.description: Place read replicas in the same region as applications and optimize query patterns to reduce data transfer

controls.title: Implement database connection pooling
controls.description: Use RDS Proxy or application-level connection pooling to reduce the need for larger instance sizes

implementation.description: Configure RDS Proxy to pool database connections and reduce connection overhead

controls.title: Regular cleanup of unused snapshots and automated backups
controls.description: Implement automated cleanup policies for old snapshots and manual backups

implementation.description: Create automated processes to delete old manual snapshots and optimize automated backup retention
